response.original_title: How to cancel norton lifelock subscription?  {{CANCELATION~GUIDE}}
response.overview: The most direct way (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) to cancel your Norton LifeLock subscription is by logging into your account at my.Norton.com. This action (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) stops future billing while keeping your identity protection active until the end of your current paid term. If you have (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) already been charged and need a refund, you must contact Member Services & Support via their official Live Chat or at (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>), as turning off auto-renewal alone (1>::<833>::<743>::<5300>) does not automatically reverse a processed payment.
response.title: How to cancel norton lifelock subscription?  {{CANCELATION~GUIDE}}
